description: This file defines a React component for the Dashboard page of a personal expense tracker. It manages expense listing, filtering by category, and adding/editing expenses. It imports other UI components and API functions to perform CRUD operations on expenses.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Fetches expenses from the API, optionally filtered by category, and updates the expenses state.

methods.name: handleCreateOrUpdate
methods.description: Handles creation or update of an expense depending on the current editing state, then refreshes the expense list.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes an expense by ID and refreshes the expense list.
